name: absolute
description: Applies position: absolute to the component.

name: active-class
description: The class applied to a v-btn when activated.

name: app
description: Designates the component as part of the application layout. Used for dynamically adjusting content sizing. Components using this prop should reside outside of v-content component to function properly. You can more information about layouts on the application page.

name: background-color
description: Changes the background-color for the component.

name: color
description: Applies specified color to the control - it can be the name of material color (for example success or purple) or css color (#033 or rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.5)). You can find list of built in classes on the colors page.

name: dark
description: Applies the dark theme variant to the component. You can find more information on the Material Design documentation for dark themes.

name: fixed
description: Applies position: fixed to the component.

name: grow
description: Force v-btns to take up all available space.

name: height
description: Sets the height for the component.

name: hide-on-scroll
description: Will transition the navigation off screen when scrolling up.

name: horizontal
description: Uses an alternative horizontal styling for v-btn.

name: input-value
description: Controls whether the component is visible or hidden. Supports the .sync modifier.

name: light
description: Applies the light theme variant to the component.

name: mandatory
description: Components.ItemGroups.props.mandatory

name: max-height
description: Sets the maximum height for the component.

name: max-width
description: Sets the maximum width for the component.

name: min-height
description: Sets the minimum height for the component.

name: min-width
description: Sets the minimum width for the component.

name: scroll-target
description: Designates the element to target for scrolling events. Uses window by default.

name: scroll-threshold
description: The amount of scroll distance down before hide-on-scroll activates.

name: shift
description: Hides text of v-btns when they are not active.

name: value
description: Holds the value of the currently active v-btn. If the button has no value supplied, its index will be used instead..

name: width
description: Sets the width for the component.
